storyInfo: On the streets of Laterano, Cecelia says to a disguised Sarkaz vendor: 'Your horns look just like Papà's... Are you also a Sarkaz?'

attributes.content: Oh, Fiammetta... Hm? Seems like you're in a bit of a mess.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: None of your business.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No need to get worked up. Care to sit down for a cup of tea?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Enough of your jokes. Why are you here? Mostima never mentioned you were our support.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Well, Velliv didn't give me an official order either.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And personally, I'm more than willing to help, yeah?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Mostima says there's another group after the little girl, and you've already run into them. Is that right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: More or less.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: After I heard from the Notarial Hall that Ezell cut his signal, I figured you might get intercepted. If you were to get caught out by the enemy, we'd end up losing the girl, no?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't know why Mostima isn't here to help you, but if she's pinned down, I figure I'll be doing her a favor.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: After all, it's not every day I get the opportunity to have the two of you in my debt.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: A few hopeless stragglers can't stop me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: 'A cautious crew sails for ten thousand years,' Fiammetta. Velliv's going to have a hold over you at this rate.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh, that's a Yanese proverb. In other words, safety is born of caution.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Stop trying to show off, Oren. You're so annoying when you talk like that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm not kidding. I at least got to express my goodwill. The rest is up to you.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Or, do you perhaps need me to escort you, my sweet Fiammetta?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: No need. Goodbye, Oren.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Executor Ezell, hand over the girl.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It is in your best interest to comply.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Your name is Fiammetta, right? Seniora Fiammetta, I have a request.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Let's hear it then.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No sudden movements. There's no telling how I might react.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I know it was suspicious of me to go against Richele's orders and turn off my terminal, but...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Believe me, I haven't betrayed Laterano.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The reason I didn't follow the Hall's exact orders was because I didn't want anything to happen to Cecelia... And, I made a promise to her.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: And how is that my problem?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Please just let me accompany you to the Basilica with Cecelia. If the Lateran Curia wants an explanation for this situation, wouldn't it be more convenient to have me around?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You're getting ahead of yourself. If you think you'll be able to influence how the Curia will handle this situation–– You'll want to disabuse yourself of that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Going one step further... If you're thinking you could take the girl away if you don't like what the Lateran Curia plans to do with her...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Not gonna happen. Not in your wildest dreams.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I wouldn't dare. I'm well aware of the Basilica's Gun-Knights.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I am a Lateran executor, after all. I was concerned before because I didn't know what was happening with Cecelia, or exactly who was after her...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Now that I understand, I will comply with your arrangements.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Um... Your name is Cecelia? Can you walk?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ezell...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia, I can carry you, if you're too tired.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'll carry her. You're too slow.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Mister Ezell, I...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Don't worry. Everything will be okay.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Executor Ezell Pastore went to 7-265 Via Thervatius in Pagus Stevonus this morning to verify an identity, record a will, and retrieve a patron firearm.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Around noon, Ezell appeared in Stevonus Central Hospital, taking in an eight-year-old Sankta girl and departing in an unusual manner.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The resident of 7-265 Via Thervatius, Pagus Stevonus, Feoria La Porta, died of illness this morning and the body was moved to the Ecclesia Requietum.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Only one individual is registered to 7-265 Via Thervatius, and the census pagus also records only one individual residing there.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: An investigation of twenty years of maintenance records at 7-265 Via Thervatius revealed that a basement had been added seven years ago, with contractor documents indicating that the space would be for storage.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: This is a file photo of Feoria La Porta and surveillance footage of the girl that Ezell took to the hospital.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You must've already reached a conclusion about where the girl came from.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Additionally, according to the report submitted by Ezell this morning, Feoria La Porta did not leave a will or an advance directive. The reason is quite clear: she hoped to avoid contact with the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: It is reasonable to infer that Feoria La Porta knew her time was short and sought to secure a future for her daughter.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: It is currently impossible to determine whether Ezell is the object of Feoria La Porta's entrustment, but based on Ezell's background, the probability is low.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Combined with the information sent back by Fiammetta, the more likely trustee should be...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Astray.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Mostima, is this the reason you stayed behind in the Basilica?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Just temporarily.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Don't be so uptight, Vel. Cream puff?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Phew. Luckily, we went for the more conservative option.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: It would've been awkward if Fiammetta walked in on me getting rid of the Notarial Hall's men.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Enough of your excuses. I'd avoid saying too much to that executor, if I were you. Cecelia's already on the Guide's side.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: That's just one executor, Patia. Things haven't gotten so out of hand that I need to get personally involved.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Plus, I think that executor's concerns are simple enough. He found the pity within him to cause his heart to waver, and couldn't bear to see a sweet little girl suffer.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Now that we understand him, it's only a matter of time until he comes over, no violence necessary.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: If only Fiammetta hadn't shown up so soon...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That is to say it's your fault for not stopping Fiammetta, Patia.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Just kidding.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But, I do take pity on that one's luck. What was a little old thing is now very complicated... That's what happens when you get ahead of yourself.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Is this, too, a trial given to us by the great and mighty Lateran?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Are you a believer again?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: A true believer wouldn't say something like that. Those sorts, who treat hardships as trials, they turn it all into... a blessing from fate?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: There are quite a lot of believers like that around the two of you, aren't there?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I'd take them over self-serving Sankta like you any day.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: So, what's the plan now? Once Cecelia gets to the Basilica, is she going to come out again? Do we have some way to take her?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: One step at a time, Patia. If we're talking about not wanting Cecelia to step foot in the Basilica, I'm even less inclined than you.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But, we haven't played all our cards, have we?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Go tail Fiammetta, but not too closely.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I've got plenty on my plate. Just found out that someone's looking for me too. Popularity isn't all it's made out to be, you know.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Don't go inviting trouble for me.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Alright, looks like the next clue of the chain is clear. What do you plan to do?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I will go to him.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Even though I have no doubts about your, uh, strength... you're dealing with a well-connected Legatus. It'll look pretty bad if you make something out of nothing.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: He is involved in this incident.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: We have to look into this precisely because he's involved, right? Sometimes, I envy the way you see things.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: But what if he doesn't know anything?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I need to investigate to be clear.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That's true. In any case, the fact that a Legatus is involved at all warrants looking into.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What I didn't expect is that Feoria, an ordinary and reclusive Sankta, would provide us with so many leads. An undocumented girl, a Legatus...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And... a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmm, you're leaving? Not even going to say goodbye?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, alright then...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Now that you're gone...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Don't blame me, Oren. I can't stop Federico.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'll put in a report for you. That's about all I can do.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: She's asleep.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: She's exhausted.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You mentioned that you made her a promise. What was it?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: That I'd help her find her mother.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Her mother? Wait, didn't Mostima say in the message that her mother is...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Yes, dead. Saw the body with my own eyes in the back of the Ecclesia Requietum's hearse.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Then, why'd you promise her that?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I didn't know, at the time.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: And then? Did you tell her?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I did. But at her age, I'm not sure she understands the concepts of 'passing on' or 'death.'
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Must've been tough for you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And... don't look so upset. I don't think the Pope... will treat the girl too harshly.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Her name is Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Seniora Fiammetta...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Just Fiammetta is fine.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Miss Fiammetta... I was thinking, after Cecelia goes to the Basilica, will she ever come out again...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I can't promise you anything. But the way I see things, all else aside, she has a halo. That makes her a Sankta.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And when dealing with a Sankta, all must obey the Commandments, be it the Lateran Curia or the Notarial Hall. At least that's what I believe.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Even if she's undocumented.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Uhh... is that really the main issue?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Who knows? Might be possible to get her registered retroactively.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But, there's... something wrong with Cecelia's halo.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm not entirely sure how serious this whole mixed-blood Sankta issue gets... But at least the Legatus implied that Cecelia would be fine.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: A lot of foreign envoys have been gathering in Laterano lately, right?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: His Holiness has been preparing a major summit... I can't help but worry that Cecelia will be a target for someone trying to stir up trouble.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sounds like you've really thought this one through.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Coming from the other angle, what would the Lateran Curia do to prevent that from happening?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Miss Fiammetta, I don't know if I should even be thinking about these things.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But I can't just not think.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You'll have to pardon me for being blunt.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But what's the point of worrying about all this? Is there any part of it you can actually control?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If you know that Cecelia is in danger, then you should also understand that for Cecelia, the Basilica is the safest place.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Nngh...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Sorry, I fell asleep...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Did we wake you?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: N-No, I just...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ezell, is that your stomach growling?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Want me to buy you a donut, Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: D-Donut? Okay! Thank you, Mister Ezell...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll go for it. I need a break, my arms are sore from carrying her around.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: (*whispers*) There's no way I can handle her long-term, alright?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But don't do anything stupid, Ezell. I've got my eye on you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You still don't trust me?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Oh, and turn on your terminal. You're not allowed to have it off.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Yeah, I know.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Mister Ezell, that lady was so mean to you before... I'm scared.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Don't worry, Cecelia. She's not a bad person.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mister Ezell... can't I go see Mamma? Can't I even say goodbye to her?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Um... Well, we need to take you somewhere else first, so you can be safe.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: As for your mama... I'll tell you about her later. Let me... think about it first. Is that okay, Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Do you hear that?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hear what?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Someone is singing...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Let's see... Oh, you're right! It seems to be coming from that cotton candy cart... But I'm surprised you could hear it with all the noise on the street. You have really good hearing, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's because I recognize that song!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma taught it to me!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Um... I can't go off on my own, right?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's okay. We can't go over there, but I can get the cotton candy cart to come over here.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Excuse me––
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is someone calling us?
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: Hum hum hum~♪
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: You really like that song, don't you...? Hey, there really is someone hailing us. Let's head over there. If we can't get any info, let's at least make some money.
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: All~ righty~♪
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: Hello...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Oh hello, little girl, would you like some cotton candy?
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: We'll get two, or actually, three sticks. This flavor here, this one here, and then the swirl. Is that alright?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No problem.
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: Three sticks, coming right up.
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: Um, excuse me... What's the name of that song you were singing earlier?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma taught me the same song, but never told me what it's called...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Huh? Your mama... taught you this song?
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: Um, excuse me, the cotton candy! The cotton candy is coming out!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ahh, I'm so very sorry, just give me a moment––
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: Hold on, the compartment's about to overflow! Let me help you...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry!
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Your hat!!! Your hat's caught!
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: *rip*––
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: W-Wait, don't get the wrong idea, she's a Caprinae...
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: Miss!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Your horns look just like Papà's...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Are you also a Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Put it back on!!
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: I, no, I'm... Little missy, you, you've got it all wrong...
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: A Sarkaz infiltrating Laterano... Are you also after Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: What happened, Ezell?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Miss Fiammetta, this particular individual... is a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But there's another sentence that I dare not say.
Tch... Guess we have no choice, now that it's come to this...
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: You've got guts, I'll give you that...
attributes.name: Fiammetta
